title: test public api root endpoint
description: Verify the root endpoint returns API metadata including name, version, and docs URL without requiring tenant slug.

title: test public api health check endpoint
description: Verify the health check endpoint returns status 'ok', current timestamp, and environment information without requiring tenant slug.

title: test public api swagger ui endpoint
description: Verify the Swagger UI endpoint returns the Swagger UI HTML page without requiring tenant slug.

title: test auth api login endpoint
description: Verify login with valid email and password returns access token, refresh token, and professional details; invalid credentials return 401; missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404.

title: test auth api refresh token endpoint
description: Verify refresh token endpoint returns new access token for valid refresh token; invalid or expired refresh token returns 401; missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404.

title: test auth api logout endpoint
description: Verify logout endpoint invalidates tokens and returns 200 on success; unauthorized access returns 401; missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404.

title: test auth api request otp endpoint
description: Verify request OTP endpoint generates and stores OTP in Redis with TTL for valid email; missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404.

title: test auth api verify otp endpoint
description: Verify verify OTP endpoint validates OTP and issues tokens for valid OTP; invalid or expired OTP returns 401; missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404.

title: test professionals api list endpoint
description: Verify listing professionals with valid JWT and tenant slug returns paginated list; unauthorized or forbidden access returns 401 or 403.

title: test appointments api create endpoint
description: Verify creating appointment with valid JWT and tenant slug succeeds; conflicts in scheduling return 409; unauthorized or missing tenant slug returns 401.
